downloadTitle: Microsoft Internet Security and Acceleration (ISA) Server 2004, and 2006 Management Pack for Operations Manager 2007
downloadDescription: The ISA Server Management Pack monitors ISA Server events and alerts for the ISA Server versions 2004 and 2006.

downloadFile.name: Microsoft ISA 2004-2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
downloadFile.url: https://download.microsoft.com/download/4/d/f/4dfa671a-1dae-457e-a436-894fc39e2527/Microsoft ISA 2004-2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi

detailsSection:
The ISA Server Management Pack monitors ISA Server events and alerts for the ISA Server versions 2004 and 2006. With detailed alert information you can quickly identify and troubleshoot ISA Server issues, minimizing time-to-resolution when problems occur. Collect and analyze performance trends and metrics. Performance information allows you to manage bottlenecks, identify capacity requirements, and proactively manage your ISA Server configuration to resolve issues before problems occur.

Requires OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update) 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)

Release History:
Initial Release for OpsMgr 2007 8/31/2007 Version 6.0.5000.0
detailsSection_file_name: Microsoft ISA 2004-2006 System Center Operations Manager 2007 MP.msi
systemRequirementsSection:
Required Software:
System Center Operations Manager 2007,
Microsoft ISA Server 2004, or 2006
OpsMgr 2007 MOM 2005 Backward Compatibility MP Update 6.0.5000.12 (or higher)
